about_the_game:
Build your own piece of cemetery. Make it a place to memorize your dear ones or honor yourself.

Memorial Park of Hypoxia is a simulation of a memorial park. Here you can:

Choose a piece of land;

Build different things, such as tombs, sculptures;

Each land has a name of the player who creates it above it;

Go and see others' places;

Experience the calm and peace of Memorial Park and bird singing;

Watch the weather changes;

Alteration of day and night;

Scare the birds away.
detailed_description:
Build your own piece of cemetery. Make it a place to memorize your dear ones or honor yourself.

Memorial Park of Hypoxia is a simulation of a memorial park. Here you can:

Choose a piece of land;

Build different things, such as tombs, sculptures;

Each land has a name of the player who creates it above it;

Go and see others' places;

Experience the calm and peace of Memorial Park and bird singing;

Watch the weather changes;

Alteration of day and night;

Scare the birds away.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 64-bit 16.04+
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo / AMD Phenom II
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 450 or higher with 1GB
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.12+
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 450 or higher with 1GB
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/10
  • Processor: 3GHz Duo Core Processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 450 or higher with 1GB Memory
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Default
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/10
  • Processor: 2GHz Quad Core Processor
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 950 or higher with 2GB Memory
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Default

short_description: Build your own piece of cemetery. Make it a place to memorize your dear ones or honor yourself.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Bulgarian, Czech, Danish, Dutch, Finnish, Greek, Hungarian, Japanese, Korean, Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese - Portugal, Romanian, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Swedish, Thai, Traditional Chinese, Turkish, Ukrainian, Vietnamese
